plotaction.name: plot
plotaction.rule: A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec

plotaction.description: Plots each series on the same plot
plotaction.name: Plot as multiple series
plotaction.rule: Multiple vectors

plotaction.ID: Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotaction.action: @(varNames) plotpickerfunc('defaultdisplay','Plot as multiple series vs. first input',varNames)
plotaction.description: Plots the second and later series against the first series on the same plot
plotaction.labelfcn: @(varNames,varVals) plotpickerfunc('defaultlabel','plot as multiple series vs. first input',varNames,varVals)
plotaction.name: Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotaction.rule: 3 or more vectors of the same size

plotaction.name: bar
plotaction.rule: A single matrix or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size. Either choice with an optional scalar bar width

plotaction.name: area
plotaction.rule: A matrix or vector or 2 matrices or vectors of compatible size with an optional scalar base value

plotaction.name: pie
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with an optional vector or matrix of explosion parameters and optional cell array of labels

plotaction.name: hist
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: contour
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec.

plotaction.description: Display a matrix as a surface
plotaction.name: surf
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 x,y,z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: mesh
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: plot
plotaction.rule: A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec

plotaction.description: Plots each series on the same plot
plotaction.name: Plot as multiple series
plotaction.rule: Multiple vectors

plotaction.ID: Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotaction.action: @(varNames) plotpickerfunc('defaultdisplay','Plot as multiple series vs. first input',varNames)
plotaction.description: Plots the second and later series against the first series on the same plot
plotaction.labelfcn: @(varNames,varVals) plotpickerfunc('defaultlabel','plot as multiple series vs. first input',varNames,varVals)
plotaction.name: Plot as multiple series vs. first input
plotaction.rule: 3 or more vectors of the same size

plotaction.description: Graphs with y tick labels on the left and right
plotaction.name: plotyy
plotaction.rule: 4 vectors all of the same length of x1,y1,x2,y2. Y values can also be matrices.

plotaction.name: semilogx
plotaction.rule: A vector/matrix or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec parameter

plotaction.name: semilogy
plotaction.rule: A vector/matrix or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec parameter

plotaction.name: loglog
plotaction.rule: A vector/matrix or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec parameter

plotaction.name: area
plotaction.rule: A matrix or vector or 2 matrices or vectors of compatible size with an optional scalar base value

plotaction.name: errorbar
plotaction.rule: 2 to 4 vectors or matrices all of the same size

plotaction.name: plot3
plotaction.rule: 3 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec

plotaction.name: comet
plotaction.rule: 1 or 2 vectors of the same size with optional additional scalar tail length

plotaction.name: stem
plotaction.rule: A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with optional 'fill' followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: stairs
plotaction.rule: A matrix/vector or 2 vectors/matrices of compatible size with an optional linespec

plotaction.name: stem3
plotaction.rule: 3 vectors or matrices of compatible size with optional 'fill' followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: bar
plotaction.rule: A single matrix or a vector of X values and matrix of Y values of compatible size. Either choice with an optional scalar bar width

plotaction.name: barh
plotaction.rule: A single matrix of Y values, or a vector of x values and matrix of Y values of compatible size, followed by an optional scalar bar width

plotaction.name: hist
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: pareto
plotaction.rule: A vector of y values, with optional vector of x values or cell array of x labels of the same size

plotaction.name: plotmatrix
plotaction.rule: 1 or 2 matrices with the same number of rows, followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: scatter
plotaction.rule: A 2-column matrix or 2 vectors of the same, followed by an optional scalar or vector area parameter and optional scalar or vector colorspec

plotaction.name: scatter3
plotaction.rule: 3 vectors of the same, followed by an optional scalar or vector area parameter and optional scalar or vector colorspec

plotaction.name: spy
plotaction.rule: 1 vector or matrix followed by an optional linespec, followed by an optional scalar marker size

plotaction.name: plotmatrix
plotaction.rule: 1 or 2 matrices with the same number of rows, followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: pie
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with an optional vector or matrix of explosion parameters and optional cell array of labels

plotaction.name: pie3
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with an optional vector or matrix of explosion parameters and optional cell array of labels

plotaction.name: hist
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: rose
plotaction.rule: An angle vector with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: polar
plotaction.rule: A vector or matrix of angles with an optional vector or matrix of radii of the same size followed by an optional linepspec

plotaction.name: rose
plotaction.rule: An angle vector with optional number of bins or monotonic vector bin centers

plotaction.name: compass
plotaction.rule: Either a matrix or 2 vectors of compatible size followed by an optional linepsec

plotaction.name: contour
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec.

plotaction.name: contourf
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec

plotaction.name: contour3
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec

plotaction.name: image
plotaction.rule: 1 RGB or indexed color array or 2 vectors and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size

plotaction.description: Scale data and display as image
plotaction.name: imagesc
plotaction.rule: 1 RGB or indexed color array or 2 vectors and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size

plotaction.name: pcolor
plotaction.rule: 1 RGB or indexed color array or 2 vectors and an RGB or indexed color array of compatible size

plotaction.description: Display a matrix as a surface
plotaction.name: surf
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 x,y,z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: surfc
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: surfl
plotaction.rule: A Z matrix, or X,Y,Z matrices followed by an optional light source direction vector. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: mesh
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: meshc
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: meshz
plotaction.rule: 1 to 4 X,Y,Z, and color matrices of compatible size. Optionally replace X and Y matrices with vectors of compatible size

plotaction.name: waterfall
plotaction.rule: Waterfall plot

plotaction.name: ribbon
plotaction.rule: A Y matrix or X,Y matrices or vectors of the same size followed by an optional scalar width parameter

plotaction.name: contour3
plotaction.rule: A matrix, 2 vectors and matrix, or 3 matrices of compatible size. Optionally add a scalar or vector of contour levels and a linespec

plotaction.name: slice
plotaction.rule: A 3 dimensional volume array with 3 vectors defining slice planes

plotaction.name: feather
plotaction.rule: A numeric array or 2 numeric arrays of the same size followed by an optional linespec

plotaction.name: compass
plotaction.rule: Either a matrix or 2 vectors of compatible size followed by an optional linepsec

plotaction.name: quiver
plotaction.rule: 2 or 4 numeric arrays of the same size followed by an optional scalar scale and an optional linespec

plotaction.name: quiver3
plotaction.rule: 4 numeric arrays of the same size followed by an optional scalar scale and an optional linespec

plotaction.name: streamslice
plotaction.rule: Either 2 or 4 3-dimensional arrays of the same size followed by an optional scalar scale and an optional linespec

plotaction.name: streamline
plotaction.rule: A cell array of double arrays produced by stream2 or stream3

plotaction.name: ezplot
plotaction.rule: A function handle followed by an optional vector defining a range of x and optionally y values

plotaction.description: Easy to use 3-d parametric curve plotter
plotaction.name: ezplot3
plotaction.rule: 3 parametric function handles followed by an optional domain range vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use polar coordinate plotter
plotaction.name: ezpolar
plotaction.rule: A function handle followed by a optional vector range of theta values

plotaction.name: ezcontour
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use filled contour plotter
plotaction.name: ezcontourf
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use 3-D colored surface plotter
plotaction.name: ezsurf
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use combination surf/contour plotter
plotaction.name: ezsurfc
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.name: ezmesh
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.description: Easy to use combination mesh/contour plotter
plotaction.name: ezmeshc
plotaction.rule: A 2-input function handle followed by an optional integer grid size parameter or a 2 or 4 element domain vector

plotaction.name: bodeplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with an optional frequency vector or cell array containing a frequency range

plotaction.name: nicholsplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with an optional frequency vector or cell array containing a frequency range

plotaction.name: nyquistplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with an optional frequency vector or cell array containing a frequency range

plotaction.name: sigmaplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with an optional frequency vector or cell array containing a frequency range

plotaction.name: rlocusplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with optional vector or scalar gains

plotaction.name: pzplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects

plotaction.description: Pole-zero map plot for I/O pairs
plotaction.name: iopzplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects

plotaction.description: Step response plot of LTI systems
plotaction.name: stepplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with optional vector or scalar time value(s)

plotaction.name: impulseplot
plotaction.rule: A list of one or more LTI objects with optional vector or scalar time value(s)

plotaction.name: hsvplot
plotaction.rule: An LTI object

plotaction.name: sfitsurface
plotaction.rule: Select an sfit object with an optional additional pair of arguments: the first of which is a 2 column matrix defining the x-y data and the second of which is a vector defining the data z values.

plotaction.description: Surface with prediction bounds for an sfit object
plotaction.name: sfitpredfunc
plotaction.rule: Select an sfit object with an optional additional pair of arguments: the first of which is a 2 column matrix defining the x-y data and the second of which is a vector defining the data z values.

plotaction.description: Surface with prediction bounds for new observations for an sfit object
plotaction.name: sfitpredobs
plotaction.rule: Select an sfit object with an optional additional pair of arguments: the first of which is a 2 column matrix defining the x-y data and the second of which is a vector defining the data z values.

plotaction.description: Plot the residuals (fit is the plane Z=0) of an sfit object
plotaction.name: sfitresiduals
plotaction.rule: Select an sfit object with a pair of arguments: the first of which is a 2 column matrix defining the x-y data and the second of which is a vector defining the data z values.

plotaction.description: Contour plot of the surface of an sfit object
plotaction.name: sfitcontour
plotaction.rule: Select an sfit object with an optional additional pair of arguments: the first of which is a 2 column matrix defining the x-y data and the second of which is a vector defining the data z values.

plotaction.description: Plot of the data and fit
plotaction.name: cfitfit
plotaction.rule: Select an cfit object with optional additional pair of arguments specifying the predictor and response data as vectors of the same length. An additional optional argument may be added either to specify the outliers using a logical vector or to define a non-default confidence limit a scalar between 0 and 1.

plotaction.description: Plot of the data and fit with prediction bounds for the fit
plotaction.name: cfitpredfunc
plotaction.rule: Select an cfit object with optional additional pair of arguments specifying the predictor and response data as vectors of the same length. An additional optional argument may be added either to specify the outliers using a logical vector or to define a non-default confidence limit a scalar between 0 and 1.

plotaction.description: Plot of the data and fit with prediction bounds for the fit
plotaction.name: cfitpredobs
plotaction.rule: Select an cfit object with optional additional pair of arguments specifying the predictor and response data as vectors of the same length. An additional optional argument may be added either to specify the outliers using a logical vector or to define a non-default confidence limit a scalar between 0 and 1.

plotaction.name: cfitresiduals
plotaction.rule: Select an cfit object with an additional pair of arguments specifying the predictor and response data as vectors of the same length. An additional optional argument may be added either to specify the outliers using a logical vector or to define a non-default confidence limit a scalar between 0 and 1.

plotaction.description: Plot of the fit standardized residuals (residuals divided by their standard deviation)
plotaction.name: cfitstresiduals
plotaction.rule: Select an cfit object with an additional pair of arguments specifying the predictor and response data as vectors of the same length. An additional optional argument may be added either to specify the outliers using a logical vector or to define a non-default confidence limit a scalar between 0 and 1.

plotaction.description: Plot of the first derivative of the fit
plotaction.name: cfitderiv1
plotaction.rule: Select an cfit object with optional additional pair of arguments specifying the predictor and response data as vectors of the same length. An additional optional argument may be added either to specify the outliers using a logical vector or to define a non-default confidence limit a scalar between 0 and 1.

plotaction.description: Plot of the second derivative of the fit
plotaction.name: cfitderiv2
plotaction.rule: Select an cfit object with optional additional pair of arguments specifying the predictor and response data as vectors of the same length. An additional optional argument may be added either to specify the outliers using a logical vector or to define a non-default confidence limit a scalar between 0 and 1.

plotaction.description: Plot of the integral of the fit
plotaction.name: cfitintegral
plotaction.rule: Select an cfit object with optional additional pair of arguments specifying the predictor and response data as vectors of the same length. An additional optional argument may be added either to specify the outliers using a logical vector or to define a non-default confidence limit a scalar between 0 and 1.

plotaction.name: cftool
plotaction.rule: 2 or 3 vectors of the same size."

plotaction.name: sftool
plotaction.rule: 3 or 4 vectors of the same size.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtool
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolmag
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolphase
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolmagphase
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolgrpdelay
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolphdelay
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolimpulse
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolstep
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolpolezero
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolfiltcoef
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolfiltinfo
plotaction.rule: One or more of most multi-rate and adaptive filter objects inheriting from: adaptfilt.apru,adaptfilt.bap,aadaptfilt.adaptfilt,adaptfilt.adaptdffir,mfilt.abstractfirmultirate,mfilt.abstractcic.

plotaction.description: fvtool estimate fixed-point filter frequency response through filtering
plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolmagestimate
plotaction.rule: DFILT filter objects excluding adaptive or multi-rate filters (ADAPTFILT or MFILT objects).

plotaction.description: fvtool estimate of round-off noise power spectral density of filter output
plotaction.name: fdtfvtoolnoisepower
plotaction.rule: DFILT filter objects excluding adaptive or multi-rate filters (ADAPTFILT or MFILT objects).

plotaction.name: fdtzerophase
plotaction.rule: One or more adaptive filter (adaptfilt) or multi-rate filter (mfilt) objects.

plotaction.name: polyphase
plotaction.rule: A multi-rate filter object .

plotaction.name: bolling
plotaction.rule: Positive vector of assets with optional scalars for samples (integer), alpha and width

plotaction.name: highlow
plotaction.rule: 3 or 4 positive column vectors with an optional 5th color string

plotaction.name: candle
plotaction.rule: 4 positive numeric vectors of the same length

plotaction.name: kagi
plotaction.rule: 2 column numeric matrix where the second column is positive

plotaction.name: renko
plotaction.rule: 2 column numeric matrix where the second column is positive and an optional positive threshold scalar

plotaction.description: Leading and lagging moving averages chart
plotaction.name: movavg
plotaction.rule: Positive asset vector with lead and lag integers (lead less than lag) and an optional alpha positive scalar

plotaction.name: priceandvol
plotaction.rule: 6 column positive numeric matrix

plotaction.name: pointfig
plotaction.rule: Positive numeric vector

plotaction.name: volarea
plotaction.rule: Positive numeric 3 column matrix

plotaction.name: imshow
plotaction.rule: Grayscale, logical, truecolor or indexed image array (with colormap). Alternatively, an image file name may be used.

plotaction.name: imtool
plotaction.rule: Grayscale, logical, truecolor or indexed image array (with colormap). Alternatively, an image file name may be used.

plotaction.description: Plot data in an ordinary axes using points
plotaction.name: mapshow_point
plotaction.rule: Select 2 vectors of equal length and where any NaNs occur in matching positions. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes is a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot data in an ordinary axes using lines
plotaction.name: mapshow_line
plotaction.rule: Select 2 vectors of equal length and where any NaNs occur in matching positions.. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes is a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot data in an ordinary axes using polygons
plotaction.name: mapshow_poly
plotaction.rule: Select 2 vectors of equal length and where any NaNs occur in matching positions.. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes is a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot a mapstruct array in an ordinary axes
plotaction.name: mapshow_S
plotaction.rule: Select a mapstruct using the X,Y fieldnames and not the Lat, Lon fieldnames . This Plot Action is disabled when the current axes is a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot a mapstruct array in an ordinary axes using custom symbolization rules
plotaction.name: mapshow_Symbolspec
plotaction.rule: Select a mapstruct using the X,Y fieldnames and not the Lat, Lon fieldnames . This Plot Action is disabled when the current axes is a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot a 2D texure map without projection
plotaction.name: mapshow_texturemap
plotaction.rule: Select a matrix and a 1-by-3 vector or a 3-by-2 matrix. This Plot Action is disabled when the current axes is a map axes

plotaction.name: mapshow_surface
plotaction.rule: Select a matrix and a 1-by-3 vector or a 3-by-2 matrix. Alternatively select 2 double vectors and a Z double matrix of commensurate size. This Plot Action is disabled when the current axes is a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot as geolocated image as a texturemap
plotaction.name: mapshow_image
plotaction.rule: Select either 2 or 3 variables: For 2 variables, the first must be either a double matrix or a 3-d unit8 array with the size of the 3rd dimension of length 3, and the second a 1-by-3 or a 3-by-2 array. For 3 variables, the first must be an M-by-N double matrix, the second a 3 column matrix, and the third a 1-by-3 or a 3-by-2 array. This Plot Action is disabled when the current axes is a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot in a map axes as points
plotaction.name: geoshow_point
plotaction.rule: Select 2 vectors of equal length and where any NaNs occur in matching positions. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes not empty and not a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot in a map axes as lines
plotaction.name: geoshow_line
plotaction.rule: Select 2 vectors of equal length and where any NaNs occur in matching positions. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes not empty and not a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot in a map axes as polygons
plotaction.name: geoshow_poly
plotaction.rule: Select 2 vectors of equal length and where any NaNs occur in matching positions. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes not empty and not a map axes

plotaction.name: geoshow_S
plotaction.rule: Select a geostruct using the Lat,Lon fieldnames and not the X,Y fieldnames. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes not empty and not a map axes

plotaction.name: geoshow_symbolspec
plotaction.rule: Select a geostruct using the Lat,Lon and ShapeType fieldnames not the X,Y fieldnames and a symbolization struct returned from makesymbolspec. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes not empty and not a map axes

plotaction.description: Plot a 2D texure map with projection
plotaction.name: geoshow_texture
plotaction.rule: Select a matrix and a 1-by-3 vector or a 3-by-2 matrix. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes not empty and not a map axes.

plotaction.name: geoshow_surface
plotaction.rule: Select a matrix and a 1-by-3 vector or a 3-by-2 matrix. Alternatively select 2 double vectors and a Z double matrix of commensurate size. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes not empty and not a map axes.

plotaction.description: Plot as geolocated image as a texturemap
plotaction.name: geoshow_image
plotaction.rule: Select either 2 or 3 variables: For 2 variables, the first must be either a double matrix or a 3-d unit8 array with the size of the 3rd dimension of length 3, and the second a 1-by-3 or a 3-by-2 array. For 3 variables, the first must be an M-by-N double matrix, the second a 3 column matrix, and the third a 1-by-3 or a 3-by-2 array. This Plot Action is disabled if the current axes not empty and not a map axes.

plotaction.name: fvtool
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolmag
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolgrpdelay
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolphdelay
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolimpulse
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolstep
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolpolezero
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolfiltcoef
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs.

plotaction.name: fvtoolfiltinfo
plotaction.rule: Either one or more dfilt objects or one or more numerator-denominator pairs

plotaction.name: freqs
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors followed by either: i.) a frequency vector with 2 or more entries; or ii.) a real scalar value indicating the number of frequency points.

plotaction.name: impz
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a scalar or vector of integers and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: stepz
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a scalar or vector of integers and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: freqz
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a scalar or vector of integers and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: grpdelay
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a real scalar or vector and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: phasedelay
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a real scalar or vector and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: phasez
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add a real scalar or vector and a positive scalar.

plotaction.name: zerophase
plotaction.rule: A pair of numerator-denominator vectors. Optionally add real scalar or vector.

plotaction.name: zplane
plotaction.rule: A pair row vectors or column vectors or a dfilt object.

plotaction.name: wvtool
plotaction.rule: Either a sigwin object or one or more windows vectors specified using winname.

plotaction.name: cpsd
plotaction.rule: A pair of vectors of the same length. Optionally add a scalar or numeric vector and a positive integer.

plotaction.name: mscohere
plotaction.rule: A pair of vectors of the same length. Optionally add a scalar or numeric vector and a positive integer.

plotaction.name: pburg
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer order.

plotaction.name: pcov
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer order.

plotaction.name: peig
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer number of sinusoids.

plotaction.name: periodogram_psd
plotaction.rule: A single numeric vector.

plotaction.description: Mean-squared spectrum estimate using periodogram method
plotaction.name: periodogram_msp
plotaction.rule: A single numeric vector.

plotaction.name: pmcov
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer order.

plotaction.name: pmtm
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar time-bandwidth product.

plotaction.name: pmusic
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer number of sinusoids.

plotaction.name: pwelch_psd
plotaction.rule: A single numeric vector.

plotaction.name: pwelch_msp
plotaction.rule: A single numeric vector.

plotaction.name: pyulear
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector with an optional scalar integer order.

plotaction.name: spectrogram
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector. Optionally add in order: i.) a numeric vector or integer>1 ii.) a positive integer iii.) a numeric vector or integer.

plotaction.name: tfestimate
plotaction.rule: A pair of numeric vectors of the same length. Optionally add in order: i.) a numeric vector or integer>1 ii.) 1 or 2 positive integers iii.) a numeric scalar.

plotaction.name: strips
plotaction.rule: A numeric vector or matrix. Optionally add either a positive integer or between 2 and 3 positive scalars.

plotaction.name: boxplot
plotaction.rule: Numeric vector with optional grouping variable

plotaction.name: ecdf
plotaction.rule: Numeric vector

plotaction.name: histfit
plotaction.rule: Numeric vector with optional scalar bin count and distribution function string

plotaction.name: ksdensity
plotaction.rule: Numeric vector with optional numeric vector of points where the density estimate is to be evaluated

plotaction.name: Normal probability plot
plotaction.rule: Numeric vector with optional censor vector and frequency vector, all of the same size

plotaction.name: Weibull probability plot
plotaction.rule: Positive numeric vector with optional censor and frequency vector all of the same size

plotaction.name: qqplot
plotaction.rule: 1 or 2 numeric vectors or matrices with the same number of rows with optional ProbDistUnivParam object or ProbDistUnivKernel object or vector of quantiles

plotaction.name: gscatter
plotaction.rule: 2 vectors of the same size and a grouping variable

plotaction.name: hist3
plotaction.rule: Matrix with 2 columns and optional 2 element bin vector or 2 element cell array containing monotonically increasing vectors of centers

plotaction.name: scatterhist
plotaction.rule: 2 numeric vectors of the same length and a 2 element vector defining the numbers of bins

plotaction.description: Matrix of scatter plots by group
plotaction.name: gplotmatrix
plotaction.rule: 2 vectors of the same size and a grouping variable

plotaction.description: Matrix of scatter plots by group
plotaction.name: parallelcoords
plotaction.rule: A single numeric matrix

plotaction.name: andrewsplot
plotaction.rule: A single numeric matrix or vector

plotaction.name: glyphplot
plotaction.rule: A single numeric matrix or vector

plotaction.description: Glyph plot where each observation is represented as a face
plotaction.name: Faces glyph plot
plotaction.rule: A single numeric matrix or vector

plotaction.name: controlchart
plotaction.rule: A numeric matrix or timeseries object

plotaction.name: dendrogram
plotaction.rule: A numeric matrix or timeseries object

plotaction.description: Evaluate state-space model synthesized using subspace method
plotaction.name: n4sid
plotaction.rule: Select either an iddata or idfrd object with at least one input, a matrix with at least two columns, or a column vector and a matrix with the same number of columns.

plotaction.description: Evaluate input-output ARX model synthesized using least squares
plotaction.name: arx
plotaction.rule: Select an iddata object with at least one input, a real matrix with at least two columns, or a real column vector and a real matrix with the same number of columns.

plotaction.name: oe
plotaction.rule: Select either an iddata or idfrd object with at least one input, a matrix with at least two columns, or a column vector and a matrix with the same number of columns.

plotaction.description: Evaluate one-step-ahead vector time series ARX model synthesized using least squares
plotaction.name: arxtimeseries
plotaction.rule: Select an iddata object with zero inputs and at least two outputs or a real matrix with at least two columns.

plotaction.description: Evaluate one-step-ahead scalar time series AR model synthesized using least squares
plotaction.name: artimeseries
plotaction.rule: Select an iddata object with zero inputs and one output or a real column vector.

plotaction.description: Estimate frequency response with fixed frequency resolution using spectral analysis
plotaction.name: identspa
plotaction.rule: Select an iddata object or a real matrix or column vector.

plotaction.description: Estimate impulse response using prewhitened-based correlation analysis
plotaction.name: identcra
plotaction.rule: Select an iddata object representing data from a SISO system or a vector time series with two outputs. Alternatively, select a single real numeric two column matrix.

plotaction.name: iddataplot
plotaction.rule: Select one or more iddata objects.

plotaction.description: Frequency response magnitude and phase for logarithmic frequencies
plotaction.name: identbode
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idmodel, idfrd, or lti objects.

plotaction.description: Frequency response magnitude and phase for logarithmic frequencies with 1 standard deviation uncertainty band
plotaction.name: identbodeband
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idmodel, idfrd, or lti objects with non-empty covariance matrix.

plotaction.description: Frequency response magnitude and phase for logarithmic frequencies
plotaction.name: identstep
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idmodel, idnlmodel, idfrd, or lti objects.

plotaction.description: Plot step response with one standard-deviation confidence interval
plotaction.name: identstepband
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idmodel or lti objects with non-empty covariance matrix.

plotaction.name: identpzmap
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idmodel or lti objects.

plotaction.description: Plot zeros and poles with one standard-deviation confidence interval
plotaction.name: identpzmapband
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idmodel or lti objects with non-empty covariance matrix.

plotaction.description: Visualization of nonlinear black-box ARX model
plotaction.name: idnlarxplot
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idnlarx objects for which the isestimated method returns true.

plotaction.description: Visualization of nonlinear black-box Hammerstein-Wiener model
plotaction.name: idnlhwplot
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idnlhw objects for which the isestimated method returns true.

plotaction.name: identsim
plotaction.rule: Select an idmodel object with at least one input and an iddata object with matching number of inputs and, for discrete time systems, equal sample times. For discrete models, the input may alternatively be specified as a real matrix where the number of columns matches the number of model inputs. The selection order does not matter for determining the enabled state of the plot action.

plotaction.description: Compare model output and measured output
plotaction.name: identcompare
plotaction.rule: Select one or more idmodel or idnlmodel objects with at least one input and an iddata or idfrd object. All selections must have matching number of inputs and, for discrete time systems, equal sample times.

plotaction.name: identpredict
plotaction.rule: Select an idmodel or idnlmodel object and an iddata object with matching numbers of inputs and outputs and, for discrete time systems, equal sample times.
